content: A number of years ago, I'd had an avatar for several month's, it suddenly disappeared. I replaced it with a different one, but the subject was the same. I had the same experience a third time, in each case I used wolf avatars. I asked mods why this occured, I never recieved a reply. I moved on and used an avatar without wolves. No avatars disappeared since then. I guess they didn't like wolves! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
